mapper.select: select Message_Board.id as m_id, Message_Board.name as m_name, Message_Board.message as m_message, DATE_FORMAT(Message_Board.time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as m_time, Message_Comment.id as c_id, Message_Comment.name as c_name, Message_Comment.comment as c_comment, DATE_FORMAT(Message_Comment.time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as c_time, Message_Comment.parent as c_parent from Message_Board left join Message_Comment on Message_Board.id = Message_Comment.parent where Message_Board.id<=((select max(id) from Message_Board) - ((#{page} - 1) * 10)) and Message_Board.id>=((select max(id) from Message_Board) - ((#{page} - 1) * 10 + 9)) order by m_id desc, c_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into Message_Board (name, message, time) values (#{name}, #{message}, now())
